answers.answer: Hi,sorry to hear about your friend.  We cannot diagnose her over the internet.Maybe you could go with her to see her doctor.If her skin is dark it may mean a liver problem, which needs medical attention.  She may also have lost weight making her looked pinched.Managing her diabetes will mean medication and diet management.Hope things go well for you both.
So sorry about your friend- sounds like she has been through a lot!

question: My frience got the diabetes - type 2 since 2014, she is 64 years old and has got bladder cancer operation twice at 2014 and 2015, her facial skin becomes dark recently and looked pinche , my question is how about  her illness?
title: some question about the symptom of diabetes- type 2
